``` ::: ::: ## Define Model and Fit ::: {.cell execution_count=3} ``` {.python .cell-code code-fold="false"} X = get_dummies(df[['bill_length_mm', 'species', 'sex']], drop_first = True) y = df['body_mass_g'] model = LinearRegression().fit(X, y) ``` ::: ## Get Some Information ::: {.cell execution_count=4} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` R^2 0.8555368759537614 Intercept 2169.269720939399 Columns Index(['bill_length_mm', 'species_Chinstrap', 'species_Gentoo', 'sex_male'], dtype='object') Coefficients [ 32.53688677 -298.76553447 1094.86739145 547.36692408] ``` ::: :::
